Text: AWESOME. Can't believe I found this in 1080p. And PS3T rips are sterile clean for their size, too, so this is a good find.
This is the greatest upload known to man. I need to get you a fucking beer man!

Totally remember this film from my childhood...brilliant upload.

The quality for a & v is fantastic!
but it's a shame about the black letterbox.
Either way I ended up re encoding it without letterbox and at a smaller size (1200x512)
The 80s film simply isnt very sharp even with the highest quality blu-ray technology, so it can stand to get a size reduction, however this was only possible at the quality I now have thanks to the original quality of the torrent (and of course, some great audio quality!)
